notes: base lemma; common in expressions 'da un lato... dall'altro lato'

example_sentence_italian: La punta del lato è usurata.
example_sentence_english: The tip of the side is worn.
Put the chair to the side.

example_sentence_italian: I cavi sono ai lati della porta.
example_sentence_english: The cables are at the sides of the door.

example_sentence_italian: Ho preso un campione dal lato.
example_sentence_english: I took a sample from the side.

example_sentence_italian: I segni vengono dai lati opposti.
example_sentence_english: The marks come from the opposite sides.

example_sentence_italian: C'è polvere nel lato del mobile.
example_sentence_english: There is dust in the side of the furniture.

example_sentence_italian: Non ho visto difetti nei lati.
example_sentence_english: I did not see defects in the sides.
The stain is on the side.
I worked with the damaged side.

example_sentence_italian: Ho spostato i pannelli coi lati uguali.
example_sentence_english: I moved the panels with the same sides.
